It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Shift the position or location of; take out of.:Recommendation; advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Cause to be firmly attached; stick or hold together and resist separation.
The upper jawbone in vertebrates; it is fused to the cranium.
A physical device designed to hold something in place.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Shift the position or location of; take out of.
Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.
